alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 4:11PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake and south central Flathead Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 410 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Woods Bay, or 14 miles north of Polson, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Swan Lake, Rollins and Finley Point. This includes the following highways... Highway 83 between mile markers 65 and 80. Highway 93 between mile markers 88 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region
